thread.title: Lisa Veyera
thread.title_full: Merchant One reviewed by Lisa Veyera

author: Lisa Veyera
title: Lisa Veyera
text:
I recently called MerchantOne to set up my new credit card machine, and thank the lucky stars I got Mark Lindor as my customer service rep/tech.
Not only was he professional, but his knowledge was extensive. He was polite, funny and patient! He walked me right through the process as if he were there looking at my terminal, never skipping a beat. If all my calls to a customer service rep were this easy, painless and pleasant I would never dread the calls.
Thanks again Mark for your excellent service!
